tooltip: Triggers a directional sequence of explosions, perfect for clearing a path.

name: Bomb
tooltip: A stronger explosive for crowd control and facing giant enemies.

name: Bomb Scarab Mortar
tooltip: A powerful weapon launching explosive projectiles that resemble the center eye of a bomb scarab.

name: Broken Handle
tooltip: A piece of an ancient weapon. Even though it's only the handle it already feels mysteriously balanced in your hand.

name: Bubble Gun
tooltip: A strange ranged weapon that shoots out hovering bubbles, adding slippery movement on contact.

name: Burnzooka
tooltip: This fiery weapon was modeled after the grubzooka but enhanced with lava rock shielding to contain its power. Can blast away stone walls and anything weaker.

name: Chaos Staff
tooltip: An unpredictable, powerful weapon that weaves chaotic ancient energy into all kinds of projectiles. The enemy will never know what's coming for them.

name: Charm Grenade
tooltip: Nothing is as persuasive as a little explosive charm.

effects.text: +25% chance on hit to apply charm for 20 sec

name: Copper Sword
tooltip: A good weapon for slaying foes.

name: Corrupted Meteor Staff
tooltip: A weathered staff infused with cosmic corruption. It crackles with unfathomable energies and whispers of forbidden power.

name: Crude Bomb
tooltip: A small explosive to blast walls and enemies.

name: Crystal Shard Club
tooltip: This bludgeoning weapon is made from fragile crystal, that can send out splinters when swung.

name: Fire Grenade
tooltip: An explosive fit for those who want to set the world on fire!

effects.text: +100% chance to spawn napalm from explosions

name: Fireball Staff
tooltip: A magical staff that the caveling shamans use in their rituals and against uninvited guests.

name: Flintlock Musket
tooltip: Can't argue much with a handful of lead coming right at you.

name: Galaxite Chakram
tooltip: This unique throwing weapon requires finesse and dexterity to be used to its full potential.

name: Galaxite Dagger
tooltip: A quick-stabbing weapon made for close combat. The blade is so fine that it can cut a hair into two pieces lengthways.

name: Galaxite Sword
tooltip: An otherworldly weapon for slaying foes.

name: Grenade
tooltip: A throwable explosive that bounces on impact.

name: Grubzooka
tooltip: The heavy shots from the Grubzooka also tear down any dirt, sand and turf walls in its path.

name: Hand Mortar
tooltip: Problems that can't be solved can usually be blasted away.

name: Hunting Spear
tooltip: A very crude long-reach weapon used by the cavelings dwelling in the Clay Caves. Good to hunt larvae and place them over a fire.

name: Hydra Bone Sword
tooltip: A jagged sword made from a hydra's spine. It is not particularly sharp but its uneven shape can tear dangerous wounds into your opponents.

tooltip: A great weapon for slaying foes.

name: Stun Grenade
tooltip: Creates a blast that overwhelms the senses.

name: Sulfur Bomb
tooltip: A large bomb harnessing the power of pressurized toxic gas.

name: Sun Caller
tooltip: Used by great mages to conjure small stars.

name: Tentacle Whip
tooltip: An elastic tentacle that lashes out at enemies from afar. It's still alive and wiggling in your hand.

name: Throwing Daggers
tooltip: A set of curved blades. They're evenly balanced so that throwing them is as easy as pointing a finger.

name: Tin Axe
tooltip: A slower but more damaging weapon against multiple enemies.

name: Tin Dagger
tooltip: A small blade that allows for quick stabs.

name: Tin Sword
tooltip: A sharp weapon for slaying foes.

name: Tome of Ashes
tooltip: Reaks of sulfur and is hot to the touch.

name: Tome of Decay
tooltip: Flipping through its pages causes your fingers to go numb.

tooltip: More of a pamphlet, beginners guide to shadowmancy.

name: Tome of the Dead
tooltip: A vile treatise on the conjuring of restless spirits.

tooltip: Draws in nearby enemies before spitting them out in pieces.

name: Void Gun
